title: BANNED AGAIN????
body: I only just came off an AFK 10 min wait. Yesterday my sister went to hospital while i was in a game. I came back this afternoon to only find out that im on yet another AFK LPQ and its now a 20 MINUTE WAIT!!! This is very annpying because going afk once is not enough to trigger a ban! If riot support wil PLEASE help me it would be great as  1 game is not very fair especially as my sister was in hospital.

replies.body: lying sack of shiet, people like you should be perma banned!
It's quite possible he could be telling the truth but if he is lying he really needs to clean his act up, using his sister as an excuse and say she is in hospital is just terrible.
